1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy describes how Singforus Ltd ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your information in connection with your use of the Singforus platform, including our website, mobile application, and all related services (collectively, the "Service").

We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data in a transparent and secure manner. This policy explains what information we collect, why we collect it, how we use it, and what choices and rights you have. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

2. Information We Collect

We collect information to provide and improve the Service, to communicate with you, and to offer a personalised experience. The types of information we collect include:

i. Account Information: When you create an account, you provide us with personal details such as your username, email address, password, profile picture, and date of birth.

ii. Profile Information: You may choose to provide additional information to your public profile, such as your full name, location, a brief biography, and links to your social media profiles.

iii. User-Generated Content: We collect the content you create and upload, including audio and video recordings, text, comments, and messages.

iv. Usage Data: Automatically collected information about your use of the Service, such as songs you sing and your interactions.

v. Device and Technical Information: Data about the device you use, including model, operating system, IP address, and browser type.

3. How We Use Your Information

  • Provide and Maintain the Service: To operate and enhance features.
  • Personalise Your Experience: To tailor content and recommendations.
  • Improve the Service: To analyze usage trends and quality.
  • Communicate with You: To send updates and respond to requests.
  • Safety and Security: To detect and prevent fraud and abuse.

4. How We Share Your Information

We may share your information with your consent, for publicly shared content, with trusted service providers, in business transfers, or for legal compliance and protection.

5. Your Choices and Rights

You can access and update your account settings, control your public profile, delete content, and opt-out of marketing communications. Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to access, rectify, or erase your personal data.

6. Data Security

We have implemented technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, though no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

7. Children's Privacy

The Service is not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
